short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlight code tag in your Chatwork timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code Highlighting for Chatwork code tag by using highlightjs. (https://highlightjs.org/) You can choose the theme and what languages to highlight.
